SELECT sys_user."id", sys_user.phone, sys_user.name, sys_role.id as roleId, sys_user.create_time, sys_user.update_time, sys_user.is_super_admin, sys_user_role_middle.user_id, sys_role.role_name, sys_user.email FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_middle ON sys_user."id" = sys_user_role_middle.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sys_user_role_middle.role_id = sys_role."id" WHERE 1=1
AND sys_user.phone = #{pageVo.phone}
AND sys_user.name like concat(#{pageVo.nickName},'%')
order by sys_user.create_time desc
